trans-unit.resname: HealthTap is for informational purposes only. Content on HealthTap (including answers) should not be used for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment, and interactions on HealthTap do not create a doctor-patient relationship. Never disregard or delay seeking professional medical advice in person because of anything on HealthTap. Call your doctor or 911 (in the U.S.) if you think you may have a medical emergency. seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is for informational purposes only.
Content on HealthTap (including answers) should not be used for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment, and interactions on HealthTap do not create a doctor-patient relationship.
Never disregard or delay seeking professional medical advice in person because of anything on HealthTap.
Call your doctor or 911 (in the U.S.) if you think you may have a medical emergency.

target.mrk: HealthTap es sólo para fines informativos.
El contenido en HealthTap (incluyendo las respuestas) no deberán usarse para asesoría, diagnóstico o tratamiento médico, y las interacciones en HealthTap no crean una relación médico-paciente.
Nunca hagas caso omiso o te atrases en buscar asesoría médica profesional en persona por motivo de cualquier cosa en HealthTap.
Llama a tu médico o al 911 (en los EE.UU.) si crees que puedas tener una emergencia médica.

trans-unit.resname: Please sign up for our trusted payments partner, Payoneer, so your monthly HealthTap earnings can be automatically direct deposited to your bank account. HealthTap completes an accounting review in the first few business days of each month before processing a direct deposit of your prior month's earnings (and/or any previously undisbursed balance). HealthTap does not process disbursement requests in the middle of its monthly disbursement cycles. Thank you.
trans-unit.source: Please sign up for our trusted payments partner, Payoneer, so your monthly HealthTap earnings can be automatically direct deposited to your bank account. HealthTap completes an accounting review in the first few business days of each month before processing a direct deposit of your prior month's earnings (and/or any previously undisbursed balance). HealthTap does not process disbursement requests in the middle of its monthly disbursement cycles. Thank you.

seg-source.mrk: Please sign up for our trusted payments partner, Payoneer, so your monthly HealthTap earnings can be automatically direct deposited to your bank account.
HealthTap completes an accounting review in the first few business days of each month before processing a direct deposit of your prior month's earnings (and/or any previously undisbursed balance).
HealthTap does not process disbursement requests in the middle of its monthly disbursement cycles.

target.mrk: Por favor regístrate con nuestro socio confiable de pagos, Payoneer, para que así tus ganancias mensuales con HealthTap puedan depositarse automáticamente a tu cuenta bancaria.

HealthTap completa una revisión de cuentas en los primeros pocos días hábiles de cada mes antes de procesar un depósito directo de tus ganancias del mes anterior (y/o cualquier saldo no desembolsado).
HealthTap no procesa solicitudes de desembolso en la mitad de sus ciclos mensuales de desembolso.

trans-unit.resname: There was an issue verifying your Payoneer account. Please visit Payoneer's Contact page to get in touch with Payoneer's customer care team. Please remember that all deposits from HealthTap are subject to a $0.60 processing fee from Payoneer, which is simply withheld from your deposited earnings.

trans-unit.resname: A HealthScore is the way we measure health engagement. When your HealthTap activity is healthy, it goes up. Oh, did we mention that there are also rewards for maintaining a high HealthScore?

target.mrk: Un HealthScore es la forma en la que medimos la participación de la salud.
Cuando tu actividad HealthTap es saludable, sube.
Oh, ¿mencionamos que también hay recompensas por mantener un HealthScore alto?

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines

seg-source.mrk: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines

target.mrk: INSTRUCCIONES Para hacer una pregunta estupenda a HealthTap, utiliza estas útiles instrucciones

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?

seg-source.mrk: Sweat the details... at least a little.

Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks.

What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?

target.mrk: Encárgate de los detalles... al menos un poco.

Esconder ejemplos
Buena: Tuve una erupción cutánea con picazón en la parte interna de mis codos por 3 semanas.

¿Cuáles pudieran ser las causas?
No tan buena: ¿Por qué tengo una erupción cutánea?

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?

seg-source.mrk: Make it long enough to be helpful to others.
Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.

Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?

target.mrk: Hazla lo suficientemente larga para que sea útil a los demás.
Millones de personas alrededor del mundo pueden leer tu pregunta y sus respuestas.

Mostrar ejemplos
Good: ¿Qué pudo causar un dolor en la espalda baja luego de hacer las labores del hogar – Nunca he tenido una lesión en la espalda?
No tan buena: ¿Por qué tengo dolor en la espalda?

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?

seg-source.mrk:
Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?

target.mrk: Incluye sexo o género, cuando sea relevante.

Mostrar ejemplos
Sexo o género útil: ¿Qué pudo causar un chichón, del tamaño de una cuarta, justo debajo del pecho de un hombre?
Sexo o género no necesario: ¿Qué pudo causar un chichón, del tamaño de un caramelo de goma, bajo la piel en la parte posterior de mi mano?

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?

seg-source.mrk:
Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts.
What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?

target.mrk:
Mostrar ejemplos
Diferentes edades causarán diferentes respuestas: Por los últimos 2 días, mi hijo de 15 años de edad tuvo fiebre y ha estado cojeando como si su pierna le doliera.
¿Qué son algunas cosas que pudieran causar esto?
¿Por qué mi hijo de 3 años de edad ha estado experimentando algo de fiebre y cojeando como si le doliera su pierna por los últimos 2 días?

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?

seg-source.mrk: Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.

Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall.

Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34.
Is he OK for his age?

target.mrk: Incluye peso, altura y unidades de las dosis, donde sea relevante.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: Mi hijo tiene 3 años de edad, pesa 27 libras, y mide 34 pulgadas.

¿Está su tamaño bien para su edad?
No tan buena: Mi hijo tiene 3, pesa 27, y mide 34.

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?

seg-source.mrk: Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.

Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever.
He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists.

Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever.

target.mrk: Por favor, utiliza tanto los nombres de marca como los genéricos para los medicamentos, especialmente si estás fuera de los EE.UU. o estás preguntando sobre un medicamento poco común.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: Mi hijo tiene 5 años de edad, 55lbs, y tiene fiebre.
Tomaba 5ml de Tylenol (acetaminofen 120mg/5ml), pero su fiebre persiste.

¿Pueden los niños de este peso y edad tomar una dosis más grande de Tylenol?
No tan buena: Mi hijo tiene 5, pesa 55, y tiene fiebre.
Probé con el Tylenol pero la fiebre persiste.

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?

seg-source.mrk: Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.

Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?

target.mrk: Intenta evitar preguntas que predispongan a los médicos a una respuesta SÍ o NO.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: ¿Cómo funcionan los antibióticos en niños jóvenes en edad escolar?
No tan buena: ¿Los antibióticos en los niños?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?

seg-source.mrk:
Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?

target.mrk: Intenta que las opiniones queden al aire.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: ¿Por qué algunas personas están en contra de las vacunas, cuando las vacunas se utilizan para prevenir las enfermedades malignas?
No tan buena: ¿Aquellos amigos antivacunas están completamente al tanto o sólo están en negación?

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

seg-source.mrk: Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.

Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps.

Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

target.mrk: Utiliza una buena gramática, evita profanidades y aléjate de las frases dialécticas.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: Estaba haciendo giros en los brazos y sentí un dolor quemante en mi bíceps

¿Me pude haber desgarrado un músculo?
No tan buena: ¿Al hacer giros, sentí algo y el brazo me duele?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.

Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear.

Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

target.mrk: No asumas el conocimiento histórico personal.
Los médicos de HealthTap a menudo no habrán visto tus preguntas previas.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: Mi hijo de 2 años de edad obtuvo tubos auditivos por dos meses y ahora tiene fiebre y pus saliendo de su oído derecho.

¿Es ésto común?
No tan buena: ¿Y ha estado pasando por dos días, y el pus está saliendo también?

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.

seg-source.mrk: To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).

Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease.

Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor.
My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.

target.mrk: Para mantener la privacidad, deja en blanco tu nombre y los nombres de los demás (a menos que la "otra persona" sea una celebridad que haya hablado públicamente acerca de un problema).

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: Escuché que el actor Michael J. Fox habla sobre su enfermedad de Parkinson.

¿Existe algún tratamiento nuevo y bueno que haya salido en los últimos 3 años?
No tan buena: Hola querido médico.
Mi nombre es John Doe, y me pregunto si existen buenos tratamientos para la enfermedad de Parkinson.

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?

seg-source.mrk: Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.

Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?

target.mrk: Evita utilizar muchas abreviaciones ya que estas pueden volverse categóricamente confusas.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: ¿Cómo sabes si estás embarazada, si nunca tienes periodos regulares?
No tan buena: ¿Cómo sab si tas embrz si nunca tienes periodos reg?

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

seg-source.mrk: This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.

Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days.

Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

target.mrk: Este es el idioma generalmente utilizado por los médicos en HealthTap.

Mostrar ejemplos
Buena: Podé algunos árboles la semana pasada y mi brazo me ha estado doliendo por 2 días.

¿Pudo ser esta la causa?
No tan buena: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

target.mrk: EDITAR TU PREGUNTA <span class="sub_title">¿Deseas cambiar tu pregunta?
Recuerda, ¡la gramática apropiada y la correcta ortografía aumentan tus oportunidades de obtener una respuesta estupenda!

trans-unit.resname: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers. Receiving agrees and recommendations, as well as being added to another’s network, are a few of the actions that will influence your DocScore. Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.
trans-unit.source: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers. Receiving agrees and recommendations, as well as being added to another’s network, are a few of the actions that will influence your DocScore. Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: Your DocScore, which can range from 0 to 100, is a positive reflection of the recognition you've received on HealthTap from your peers.
Receiving agrees and recommendations, as well as being added to another’s network, are a few of the actions that will influence your DocScore.
Your DocScore is another powerful feature you can use to enhance your reputation on HealthTap.

target.mrk: Tu DocScore, el cual puede oscilar desde 0 hasta 100, es un reflejo positivo del reconocimiento que has recibido en HealthTap por parte de tus colegas.
Al recibir acuerdos y recomendaciones, así como también al ser agregado a la red de alguien más, son unas pocas de las medidas que influirán tu DocScore.
Tu DocScore es otra característica poderosa que puedes utilizar para mejorar tu reputación en HealthTap.

trans-unit.resname: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap. It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.
trans-unit.source: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap. It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.

seg-source.mrk: Your level is a cumulative representation of your engagement on HealthTap.

It's measured by the activity points you receive for performing various actions such as answering questions, peer reviewing your colleagues' answers, inviting colleagues to join the network and referring patients to colleagues.

target.mrk: Tu nivel es una representación acumulada de tu participación en HealthTap.

Se mide por los puntos de actividad que recibas al llevar a cabo medidas variadas tales como responder a preguntas, revisión a las respuestas de tus colegas, invitar a colegas a unirse a la red, y remitir pacientes a colegas.

trans-unit.resname: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information. This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information. Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."
trans-unit.source: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information. This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information. Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."

seg-source.mrk: You will receive an “Agree” each time one of your answers is recognized by a colleague as representing accurate and trustworthy information.
This form of peer review is vital to building trust with patients who are turning to you for the highest quality information.
Providing up-to-date and succinct answers, as well as building your own network of followers who will see each of your answers are great ways to get more “Agrees."

target.mrk: Recibirás un "Acuerdo" cada vez que una de tus respuestas sea reconocida por un colega que represente una información confiable y precisa.
Esta forma de revisión es vital para fomentar la confianza con los pacientes quienes se dirigen a ti por información de la más alta calidad.
El proporcionar respuestas actualizadas y concisas, así como también el construir tu propia red de seguidores que verán cada una de tus respuestas, son formas estupendas de obtener más "Acuerdos".

trans-unit.resname: This, along with personalized thank you notes, is how patients show their gratitude and appreciation for your compassion and expertise.

trans-unit.resname: This is a reflection of your availability. Send timely responses to paid private messages from patients on HealthTap to improve your Responsiveness score.

trans-unit.resname: The DocScore is a measure on a scale of {span_tag_start}0 to 100{span_tag_end} which reflects the degree to which other doctors agree with a doctor's answers, in addition to the extent of training, board certification and other professional accomplishments a doctor has received.
trans-unit.source: The DocScore is a measure on a scale of {span_tag_start}0 to 100{span_tag_end} which reflects the degree to which other doctors agree with a doctor's answers, in addition to the extent of training, board certification and other professional accomplishments a doctor has received.

seg-source.mrk: The DocScore is a measure on a scale of {span_tag_start}0 to 100{span_tag_end} which reflects the degree to which other doctors agree with a doctor's answers, in addition to the extent of training, board certification and other professional accomplishments a doctor has received.

target.mrk: El DocScore es una medida sobre una escala del {span_tag_start}0 al 100{span_tag_end} la cual refleja el grado al cual los demás médicos están de acuerdo con las respuestas de un médico, además hasta el grado de capacitación, y otros logros profesionales que un médico haya recibido.

trans-unit.resname: Your answers should inform and educate the user and future readers about the question, not try to diagnose or recommend treatment to any individual! If the user asks for a diagnosis or treatment, offer instead useful information about the topic of the question, and possibly also guidance to the kind of doctor that can help.

trans-unit.resname:
I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits. Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.
trans-unit.source:
I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits. Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.

seg-source.mrk: I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits.
Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.

target.mrk: Estoy feliz de compartir contigo que he encontrado una nueva estupenda forma sencilla y gratuita de ayudarte a vivir una vida más feliz y más saludable, y para que nos mantengamos conectados entre las visitas.

Muy pronto, comenzarás a recibir de mi un boletín informativo semanal de HealthTap lleno con estupendas perlas de sabiduría y hermosas fotos que puedan ayudarte a mantenerte saludable viviendo prioritariamente.

El boletín informativo vendrá desde mi Práctica Virtual en HealthTap - un servicio gratuito web y móvil que te permite hacer preguntas de salud, recibir consejos médicos diarios, y beneficiarte de la información médica más confiable y útil escrita por ti y algunos de los mejores médicos en los EE.UU.

trans-unit.resname: The Top Doctor Competition recognizes and shares with the world the best and most helpful medical experts on HealthTap. By helping people on HealthTap, you'll automatically be eligible for the Top Doctor, Top Specialist, Thought Leader, and Most Influential Doctor Awards. Participate actively on HealthTap during the competition and gain recognition for your accomplishments as a knowledgeable, caring, and helpful doctor who will be featured to millions in the new generation of HealthTap.
trans-unit.source: The Top Doctor Competition recognizes and shares with the world the best and most helpful medical experts on HealthTap. By helping people on HealthTap, you'll automatically be eligible for the Top Doctor, Top Specialist, Thought Leader, and Most Influential Doctor Awards. Participate actively on HealthTap during the competition and gain recognition for your accomplishments as a knowledgeable, caring, and helpful doctor who will be featured to millions in the new generation of HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: The Top Doctor Competition recognizes and shares with the world the best and most helpful medical experts on HealthTap.
By helping people on HealthTap, you'll automatically be eligible for the Top Doctor, Top Specialist, Thought Leader, and Most Influential Doctor Awards.

Participate actively on HealthTap during the competition and gain recognition for your accomplishments as a knowledgeable, caring, and helpful doctor who will be featured to millions in the new generation of HealthTap.

target.mrk: La Competición al Mejor Médico reconoce y comparte con el mundo los mejores y más útiles expertos médicos en HealthTap.
Al ayudar a las personas en HealthTap, automáticamente serás elegible para los premios al Mejor Médico, Mejor Especialista, Líder Pensante, y Médico Más Influyente.

Participa activamente en HealthTap durante la competición y gana reconocimiento por tus logros como un médico conocedor, atento y útil que será destacado a millones en la nueva generación de HealthTap.

trans-unit.resname: There are three ways in which doctors can interact with and learn from the HealthTap Virtual Care Course: Enrichment, CME credit, and certification.
trans-unit.source: There are three ways in which doctors can interact with and learn from the HealthTap Virtual Care Course: Enrichment, CME credit, and certification.

seg-source.mrk: There are three ways in which doctors can interact with and learn from the HealthTap Virtual Care Course:

target.mrk: Hay tres formas en las cuales los médicos pueden interactuar y aprender del Curso de Atención Virtual de HealthTap:

trans-unit.resname: The HealthTap Virtual Care Course is open and freely available to doctors all over the world. Anyone interested in learning the very best current practices in the delivery of Virtual Care can view the course for educational enrichment.
trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Virtual Care Course is open and freely available to doctors all over the world. Anyone interested in learning the very best current practices in the delivery of Virtual Care can view the course for educational enrichment.

seg-source.mrk: The HealthTap Virtual Care Course is open and freely available to doctors all over the world.
Anyone interested in learning the very best current practices in the delivery of Virtual Care can view the course for educational enrichment.

target.mrk: El Curso de Atención Virtual de HealthTap está abierto y libremente disponible a los médicos alrededor del mundo.
Cualquier interesado en aprender las mejores prácticas en la disposición de la Atención Virtual, puede ver el curso para un enriquecimiento educativo.

trans-unit.resname: Licensed doctors who complete the course are also eligible for Category 1 Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit, provided through the Accreditation Counsel for Continuing Medical Education.
trans-unit.source: Licensed doctors who complete the course are also eligible for Category 1 Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit, provided through the Accreditation Counsel for Continuing Medical Education.

seg-source.mrk: Licensed doctors who complete the course are also eligible for Category 1 Continuing Medical Education (CME) credit, provided through the Accreditation Counsel for Continuing Medical Education.

target.mrk: Los médicos certificados que completen el curso también son elegibles para un crédito de Educación Médica Contínua (EMC) Categoría 1, provisto mediante la Junta Acreditadora para la Educación Médica Contínua.

Certificado de Atención Virtual Nivel I

trans-unit.resname: requires completion of the full course and passing a test demonstrating a clear understanding of the best practices of Virtual Care, as presented in detail in the course;
trans-unit.source: requires completion of the full course and passing a test demonstrating a clear understanding of the best practices of Virtual Care, as presented in detail in the course;

seg-source.mrk: requires completion of the full course and passing a test demonstrating a clear understanding of the best practices of Virtual Care, as presented in detail in the course;

target.mrk: requiere la culminación del curso completo y pasar un examen demostrando un claro entendimiento de las mejores prácticas de la Atención Virtual, como se presenta en detalle en el curso;
Certificado de Atención Virtual Nivel II

trans-unit.resname: requires documented completion of the delivery of fifty (50) hours of virtual care to patients.
trans-unit.source: requires documented completion of the delivery of fifty (50) hours of virtual care to patients.

seg-source.mrk: requires documented completion of the delivery of fifty (50) hours of virtual care to patients.

Certificado de Atención Virtual Nivel III

trans-unit.resname: requires documented completion of the delivery of one hundred (100) hours of virtual care to patients as well as passing a supplemental advanced test demonstrating established expertise in the delivery of Virtual Care.
trans-unit.source: requires documented completion of the delivery of one hundred (100) hours of virtual care to patients as well as passing a supplemental advanced test demonstrating established expertise in the delivery of Virtual Care.

trans-unit.resname: Just like you're available when your real office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times.

target.mrk: Justo como estás disponible cuando tu oficina real está abierta, es importante que estés en línea y disponible durante sus Horas de Oficina Virtual designadas.
Los pacientes pueden estar buscándote en estos momentos.

trans-unit.resname: You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.

trans-unit.resname:
Terms and Conditions:
HealthTap Prime Free Trial
trans-unit.source:
Terms and Conditions:
HealthTap Prime Free Trial

trans-unit.resname:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTap Terms of Use and these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap account Settings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTap Terms of Use for the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.

By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and:
(i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTap Terms of Use and these Free Trial Terms.

If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap account Settings) before the end of the Free Trial Period.
Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled.
You may only use this Free Trial Offer once.

HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms:

When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details.
The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies.

These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).
See the HealthTap Terms of Use for the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.”
“New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.

target.mrk: Estos términos (los “Términos de la Prueba Gratuita”) rigen la oferta (la “Oferta de Prueba Gratuita Prime”) por HealthTap a los Nuevos Usuarios Calificados para tener acceso al Servicio HealthTap Prime al momento de registrarse y enviar la información de pago por una nueva cuenta HealthTap Prime (el “Perido de Prueba Gratuita”).
Al enviar los detalles de tu pago, aceptas la Oferta de Prueba gratuita Prime y:

(i) das consentimiento a nuestro uso de tu información de pago con nuestros Términos de los Detalles de Pago, y (ii) reconoces y estás de acuerdo con los Términos de Uso de HealthTap y estos Términos de Prueba Gratuita.

Si decides que no deseas convertirte en un usuario pago de HealthTap Prime según los Términos estándar de HealthTap Prime válidos al final del Periodo de Prueba Gratuita, debes cancelar tu Suscripción a HealthTap (en la sección de Ajustes de Facturación en tu cuenta HealthTap Settings) antes que finalice el Periodo de Prueba Gratuita.

Las comisiones de suscripción no son prorrateadas; las cancelacioens luego de la culminación del Periodo de Prueba Gratuita permanecerán activas a través del periodo de duración de la prueba, durante el cual la cuenta es cancelada.
Sólo puedes utilizar esta Oferta de Prueba Gratuita una vez.

HealthTap se reserva el derecho, a su absoluta discreción, de determinar la elegibilidad individual para esta Oferta de Prueba Gratuita Prime y/o los Términos de Prueba Gratuita en cualquier momento, sin previo aviso y sin alguna responsabilidad.

Términos de los Detalles de Pago:

Cuando te registras para una prueba o a cualquiera de nuestros Servicios Prémium, o haces otras compras a través de las Aplicaciones, la información de tu tarjeta de crédito y otros datos financieros necesarios para procesar tu pago son recolectados y almacenados por procesadores de pago de terceros, y recolectamos alguna información limitada, tal como tu código postal y los detalles del historial de transacciones.
El uso de tus datos por cualquier procesador de pago de terceros está sujeto a sus políticas de privacidad.

Estos terceros generalmente nos brindan alguna información limitada (tal como una ficha exclusiva que te permite hacer compras adicionales utilizando la información que han almacenado, y tu tipo de tarjeta, fecha de vencimiento, y los últimos cuatro dígitos).
Consulta los Términos de Uso de HealthTap para las definiciones de "HealthTap", "HealthTap Prime", "Aplicaciones", y "Servicios Premium".
"Nuevos Usuarios Calificados" se refiere a los nuevos clientes de HealthTap Prime sin ninguna cuenta principal o secundaria o cuenta de prueba en HealthTap Prime.

Por favor, ten en cuenta que las siguientes prescripciones médicas actualmente no están disponibles mediante: HealthTap Prime: narcóticos o sustancias controladas por la DEA (Programación I, II, III, IV), medicamentos psiquiátricos o de estilo de vida (tales como fármacos dietéticos, o de disfunción eréctil), o medicamentos restringuidos por estados individuales.
Ingresa el código para recibir un descuento

trans-unit.resname:
When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available). You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults. Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.
See Additional Information
trans-unit.source:
When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available). You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults. Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.
See Additional Information

seg-source.mrk: When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available).
You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults.
Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.

target.mrk: Cuando solicitemos conectarte con un médico, notificaremos al médico mediante correo electrónico (según corresponda).
Serás notificado si estás confirmado como el paciente de este médico o aceptado por el médico por consultas médicas.
Por favor, ten en cuenta que: los médicos no siempre reciben o responden a estas solicitudes, así que nunca te retrases al buscar o recibir atención en persona como sea necesario.

trans-unit.resname: Postgraduate Institute for Medicine (PIM) requires instructors, planners, managers and other individuals who are in a position to control the content of this activity to disclose any real or apparent conflict of interest (COI) they may have as related to the content of this activity. All identified COI are thoroughly vetted and resolved according to PIM policy. PIM is committed to providing its learners with high quality CME activities and related materials that promote improvements or quality in healthcare and not a specific proprietary business interest of a commercial interest.

All identified COI are thoroughly vetted and resolved according to PIM policy.

PIM is committed to providing its learners with high quality CME activities and related materials that promote improvements or quality in healthcare and not a specific proprietary business interest of a commercial interest.

target.mrk: El Instituto de Posgrado de Medicina (PIM, por sus siglas en inglés) requiere instructores, planificadores, administradores, y otras personas que estén en una posición para controlar el contenido de esta actividad para divulgar cualquier conflicto de interés (COI) real o aparente que puedan tener según sea relacionado con el contenido de esta actividad.
Todos los COI identificados son minuciosamente examinados y resueltos de acuerdo con la política del PIM.

El PIM está comprometido con promover a sus aprendices con actividades EMC de alta calidad y materiales relacionados que promuevan las mejoras o calidad en la atención médica y no un interés comercial de propiedad específica de interés comercial.

trans-unit.resname:
Doctors can provide care and recommend and prescribe appropriate treatments. New treatment prescriptions and refills (both excluding controlled drugs), which can be sent to your local pharmacy, are available where medically indicated and deemed appropriate by the treating doctor based on your Virtual Consult.

Enjoy the convenience of having prescription treatments sent to your local pharmacy, whether you're at home or on vacation. Learn more ›
trans-unit.source:
Doctors can provide care and recommend and prescribe appropriate treatments. New treatment prescriptions and refills (both excluding controlled drugs), which can be sent to your local pharmacy, are available where medically indicated and deemed appropriate by the treating doctor based on your Virtual Consult.

Enjoy the convenience of having prescription treatments sent to your local pharmacy, whether you're at home or on vacation. Learn more ›

seg-source.mrk: Doctors can provide care and recommend and prescribe appropriate treatments.

New treatment prescriptions and refills (both excluding controlled drugs), which can be sent to your local pharmacy, are available where medically indicated and deemed appropriate by the treating doctor based on your Virtual Consult.
Enjoy the convenience of having prescription treatments sent to your local pharmacy, whether you're at home or on vacation.

target.mrk: Los médicos pueden brindar atención y recomendar y prescribir tratamientos adecuados.

Nuevas prescripciones médicas para tratamiento y reabastecimiento (ambos excluyendo los fármacos controlados), los cuales pueden enviarse a tu farmacia local, están disponibles donde sean médicamente indicados y considerados apropiados por el médico tratante en base a tu Consulta Virtual.
Disfruta la conveniencia de tener tratamientos de prescripciones médicas enviados a tu farmacia local, ya sea que estés en casa o de vacaciones.

trans-unit.resname:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay

seg-source.mrk: RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties.
RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions.

Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.
Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars.

Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication.
We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences.
The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.
Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing.
All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate.
In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate.
Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.
RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest.

When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating.
Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these.
Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system.
Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed.

Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication.
Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating.
Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs.
Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented.
This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication.

The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition.

Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

target.mrk: RateRx es un recurso nuevo e independiente para tanto los médicos como los pacientes, que presenta las calificaciones de la efectividad del medicamento según sea reportado por miles de médicos certificados de los EE.UU. en práctica clínica de más de 137 especialidades.
RateRx representa la primera valoración integral de lo que los médicos experimenados en cada especialidad utilizan realmente en el cuidado de los pacientes con condiciones específicas.

A diferencia de otros estudios, los cuales pueden informar de la efectividad clínica de los tratamientos bajo circunstancias controladas, RateRx dispone de la experiencia en tiempo real profunda y a largo plazo de los mejores médicos para revelar cuáles tratamientos qe han aprendido los médicos funcionan realmente con los pacientes.
Los médicos fueron solicitados que califiquen la efectividad clínica de un fármaco para tratar una patología en una escala de 1 a 5 estrellas.

Los médicos contribuyentes otorgaron calificaciones a los medicamentos para su uso con indicaciones específicas con base a su conocimiento y fueron instruidos a proveer datos de entradas basados sólo en la experiencia clínica utilizando el fármaco para esa indicación.
Resumimos las calificaciones combinadas para cada tratamiento en una calificación agregada reflejando las experiencias colectivas de los médicos.

Los perfiles de todos los médicos que suministraron calificaciones son visibles a los usuarios, quienes pueden revisar los detalles de la capacitación y experiencias de los médicos, incluyendo sus especialidades y certificados de la junta médica.
La participación en este estudio estuvo abierta a todos los médicos certificados de EE.UU. de buena reputación.
Todos los 66.000 médicos en la Red de Expertos Médicos de HealthTap fueron motivados a participar.
Además, HealthTap invitó a más de 500.000 médicos certificados de EE.UU. en nuestra red extendida para participar.

Los médicos son capaces de ingresar calificaciones de efectividad para los medicamentos que traten cualquier patología, y pueden ingresar y agregar calificaciones para cualquier tratamiento con medicamento nuevo que no se haya incluído.
Los resultados de RateRx muestran cada tratamiento para una indicación en una calificación ordenada, con base a calificaciones promedio, desde la más alta hasta la más baja.

Cuando las diferencias entre las calificaciones de tratamientos alternativos se estimen significativas con base a la cantidad de datos presentados.

Para garantizar evaluaciones imparciales del médico, los médicos no ven las contribuciones existentes de los colegas hasta después que hayan ingresado su propia calificación.
Las recomendaciones no pueden cambiarse una vez sean enviadas, pero luego que sean entregadas las calificaciones, los médicos pueden ver las calificaciones de otros médicos y comentar sobre estas.
Tanto los pacientes como los médicos pueden aprender del sistema de calificaciones de RateRx.
Los pacientes se benefician de la sabiduría colectiva compartida por estos médicos, permitiéndoles ver cómo distintos tratamientos para las mismas condiciones fueron calificados y revisados.

Los Médicos se benefician de las calificaciones y comentarios de sus colegas, y son capaces de interpretarlos refiriéndolos a los perfiles de práctica de los médicos contribuyentes (los cuales muestran su educación y experiencia, su capacitación en la especialidad, años de ejercicio, su DocScore, y sus temas de "Reconocimiento).

Los comentarios, los cuales son opcionales, a menudos son utilizados por los médicos para calificar o explicar las calificaciones, o para compartir detalles de cómo los medicamentos son utilizados para cada indicación.
Los comentarios están disponibles para leerlos y revisarlos, no cambian el valor numérico de la calificación.
Las calificaciones están basadas en nombres genéricos del fármaco, sin embargo los nombres comerciales son presentados para permitir a los médicos a calificar fármacos específicos.
Los nombres comerciales son mostrados por cada nombre de medicamento genérico presentado.
Este estudio no diferencia las calificaciones entre diferentes nombres comerciales para el mismo medicamento.

Los tratamientos con medicamentos más comunes para cada condición están catalogados para las calificaciones, sin embargo los médicos son motivados a agregar tratamientos para cualquier indicación, asegurando la inclusión de tratamientos nuevos o novedosos para cada condición.

Los médicos fueron instruidos para agregar medicamentos no previamente en la lista de tratamiento estándar, sólo si ellos habían experimentado utilizando el medicamento para tratar la condición en discusión y hallaron que este medicamento es efectivo en el tratamiento de esa condición.

trans-unit.resname: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.source: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.

seg-source.mrk: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.

target.mrk: Nuestra misión es prolongar, de manera mensurable, la expectativa de vida de la humanidad y ayudar a que todos se Sientan Bien brindando acceso inmediato a los mejores médicos expertos y a su asesoría médica confiable en cualquier momento, en cualquier lugar.

trans-unit.resname:
HealthTap has reinvented the way people all over the world take care of their health and well-being, connecting millions everywhere with the most trusted health information and doctors.

Why choose us
With over 2.6 billion answers served from more than 100 specialties, our experts are able to provide the best medical advice for your question. We have the largest doctor network to provide answers, personalized advice, and care for any question.

About our doctors
To become a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, doctors have to be U.S. board certified, pass a stringent qualification process, and undergo training on how to give helpful advice using our technology platform. We closely monitor user feedback to ensure that our doctors are providing the highest possible care.

Why choose us

We have the largest doctor network to provide answers, personalized advice, and care for any question.

About our doctors
To become a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, doctors have to be U.S. board certified, pass a stringent qualification process, and undergo training on how to give helpful advice using our technology platform.

target.mrk: HealthTap ha reinventado la forma en que las personas de todo el mundo cuidan de su salud y bienestar, conectando millones en todos lados con la información de salud y los médicos más confiables.

Por qué elegirnos
Con más de 2.6 millardos de respuestas atendidas de más de 100 especialidades, nuestros expertos son capaces de proporcionar la mejor asesoría médica para tu pregunta.
Tenemos la más amplia red de médicos para brindar respuestas, asesoría personalizada, y atención para cualquier pregunta.

Acerca de nuestros médicos
Para convertirse en un miembro de la Red de Expertos Médicos de HealthTap, los médicos tienen que ser certificados por la junta médica de los EE.UU., pasar por un estricto proceso de calificación, y experimentar capcitación sobre cómo brindar asesoría útil utilizando nuestra plataforma tecnológica.
Monitoreamos de cerca los comentarios de los usuarios para garantizar que nuestros médicos estén brindando la más alta atención posible.

trans-unit.source: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the \ choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. \ It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever \ you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by \ typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.

seg-source.mrk: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the \ choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat.
\ It’s important to start each consult with a smile.
Do whatever \ you can to make the patient feel comfortable.
Practice now by \ typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.

target.mrk: Cuando aceptes una consulta, tu paciente tendrá la \ elección de interactuar contigo mediante chat de video, voz o texto.
\ Es importante comenzar cada consulta con una sonrisa.
Haz lo que sea \ que puedas para hacer que el paciente se sienta cómodo.
Practica ahora al \ escribir un mensaje de chat agradable a continuación y presionar "enter" para enviar.

trans-unit.resname: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient \ explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.source: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient \ explaining the reason for the consult.

seg-source.mrk: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient \ explaining the reason for the consult.

target.mrk: Todas las consultas comenzarán con un mensaje de chat por parte del paciente \ explicando la razón de la consulta.

Durante tu consulta, \ puedes adjuntar archivos (como panfletos o materiales educativos)\ para ayudar a que tu paciente comprenda tus comentarios o asesoría.

trans-unit.resname: Great! The Patient Chart will be very helpful to you, as you \ can see your patient’s medical history, read questions the patient \ has asked, and review consult notes from other HealthTap doctors.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from \ the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by \ explaining that this is normal and expected.

trans-unit.resname: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient \ who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not \ to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice \ and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.source: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient \ who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not \ to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice \ and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.

seg-source.mrk: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient \ who is not yet accepted into your practice.
Even if you choose not \ to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice \ and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.

target.mrk: Las consultas introductorias son una primera visita con un potencial paciente \ que aún no está aceptado en tu ejercicio.
Incluso si eliges no \ aceptar a un paciente dentro de tu ejercicio, todavía puedes ofrecer asesoría \ y sugerir atención de seguimiento adecuada durante la consulta introductoria.

trans-unit.resname: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the \ continue button.

When done, press the \ continue button.

target.mrk: Ingresa Notas de Consulta Introductoria para el paciente.
Cuando estés listo, presiona el \ botón continuar.

trans-unit.resname: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark \ below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient \ into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your \ reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.source: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark \ below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient \ into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your \ reach and grow your practice!

¡Esta es una estupenda forma de extender tu \ alcance e incrementar tu ejercicio!

trans-unit.resname: Press the checkmark icon to accept the patient.
trans-unit.source: Press the checkmark icon to accept the patient.

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note \ displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit \ your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's \ take a tour through each of the sections.

trans-unit.resname: Please click continue to move forward.
trans-unit.source: Please click continue to move forward.

seg-source.mrk: Please click continue to move forward.

target.mrk: Por favor, haz clic en continuar para avanzar.

trans-unit.resname: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, \ and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about \ the visit.

trans-unit.source: Try filling these out. Click continue when you're ready.

trans-unit.resname: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your \ patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.source: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your \ patient follow through with your recommendations.

seg-source.mrk: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your \ patient follow through with your recommendations.

target.mrk: La sección Plan tiene muchos elementos estructurados para ayudar a tu \ paciente a seguir con tus recomendaciones.

trans-unit.resname: Click continue to go through each one.
trans-unit.source: Click continue to go through each one.

seg-source.mrk: Click continue to go through each one.

target.mrk: Haz clic en continuar para pasar por cada uno.

trans-unit.resname: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that \ you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up \ care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can \ also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just \ a few clicks.
trans-unit.source: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that \ you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up \ care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can \ also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just \ a few clicks.

seg-source.mrk: This is where you can really help your patient!
You’ll notice that \ you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up \ care instructions.
Make sure you have at least one. You can \ also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just \ a few clicks.

target.mrk: ¡Esto es donde puedes realmente ayudar a tu paciente!
Te darás cuenta que \ puedes agregar tantos pasos de medida recomendados o instrucciones \ de atención por seguimiento.
Asegúrate que tengas al menos una. También \ puedes cambiar cualquier recomendación en un recordatorio normal con solo \ unos pocos clics.

trans-unit.resname: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, \ once a day, for a month.

For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, \ once a day, for a month.

target.mrk: Por ejemplo, recomienda una caminata de 30 minutos, \ una vez al día, por un mes.

trans-unit.resname: To prescribe a medication, press "Add" to the right of the section.
trans-unit.source: To prescribe a medication, press "Add" to the right of the section.

seg-source.mrk: To prescribe a medication, press "Add" to the right of the section.

target.mrk: Para prescribir un medicamento, presiona "Agregar" a la derecha de la sección.

trans-unit.resname: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe \ medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. \ For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.source: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe \ medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. \ For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.

seg-source.mrk: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe \ medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy.
\ For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.

target.mrk: Una de las cosas que los pacientes realmente aprecian es que puedas prescribir \ medicamentos que sean enviados directamente a la farmacia indicada por el paciente.
\ Para pacientes ubicados fuera de los EE.UU., puedes recomendar medicamentos.

trans-unit.resname: To order lab tests, press "Add" to the right of the section.
trans-unit.source: To order lab tests, press "Add" to the right of the section.

seg-source.mrk: To order lab tests, press "Add" to the right of the section.

target.mrk: Para pedir exámenes de laboratorio, presiona "Agregar" a la derecha de la sección.

trans-unit.resname: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients \ time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The \ lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient \ chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the \ results for review.
trans-unit.source: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients \ time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The \ lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient \ chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the \ results for review.

seg-source.mrk: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients \ time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually.
The \ lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient \ chooses.
Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the \ results for review.

target.mrk: Otra nueva funcionalidad, que encanta y ahorra tiempo \ a los pacientes es la capacidad para ti de pedir exámenes de laboratorio de forma virtual.
La \ orden de laboratorio será enviada al Centro de Servicio de Búsqueda que el paciente \ elija.
Una vez que el paciente haya sido evaluado, te serán enviados los \ resultados para su revisión.

trans-unit.resname: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab \ tests you can order.
trans-unit.source: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab \ tests you can order.

seg-source.mrk: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab \ tests you can order.

target.mrk: Simplemente comienza escribiendo para ver las opciones de más de 2.000 exámenes \ de laboratorio que puedes ordenar.

trans-unit.resname: To request a follow-up appointment, press "Add" to the right of the section.
trans-unit.source: To request a follow-up appointment, press "Add" to the right of the section.

seg-source.mrk: To request a follow-up appointment, press "Add" to the right of the section.

target.mrk: Para solicitar una cita de seguimiento, presiona "Agregar" a la derecha de la sección.

trans-unit.resname: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient \ should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. \ The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.source: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient \ should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. \ The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.

\ El paciente recibirá un enlace para programar fácilmente la cita.

trans-unit.resname: Go ahead, try it now. Click the "Add" button to confirm.
trans-unit.source: Go ahead, try it now. Click the "Add" button to confirm.

target.mrk: Haz clic en el botón "Agregar" para confirmar.

trans-unit.resname: To make a referral, press "Add" to the right of the section.
trans-unit.source: To make a referral, press "Add" to the right of the section.

seg-source.mrk: To make a referral, press "Add" to the right of the section.

target.mrk: Para hacer una referencia, presiona "Agregar" a la derecha de la sección.

trans-unit.resname: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside \ the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll \ provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.source: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside \ the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll \ provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
