Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll \ provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.

target.mrk: Puedes referir tus pacientes a cualquier médico dentro o fuera de \ la red HealthTap.
De forma alterna, refiere a una especialidad y \ proveeremos una lista de especialistas para que tu paciente elija.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in \ HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. \ Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled \ "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.source: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in \ HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. \ Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled \ "Available for Virtual Consults".

seg-source.mrk: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in \ HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care.
\ Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled \ "Available for Virtual Consults".

target.mrk: Recomendamos que refieras los pacientes a los médicos que participen en \ HealthTap Concierge para que tus pacientes puedan obtener cuidado de seguimiento inmediato.
\ Los médicos Concierge serán instruidos con un pequeño punto verde y etiquetados como \ "Disponible para Consultas Virtuales".

trans-unit.resname: To recommend a checklist, press "Add" to the right of the section.
trans-unit.source: To recommend a checklist, press "Add" to the right of the section.

seg-source.mrk: To recommend a checklist, press "Add" to the right of the section.

target.mrk: Para recomendar una lista de comprobación, presiona "Agregar" a la derecha de la sección.

trans-unit.resname: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve \ a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each \ to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that \ doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for \ your patient.
trans-unit.source: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve \ a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each \ to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that \ doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for \ your patient.

seg-source.mrk: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve \ a health goal or feel better.
Patients receive timely reminders for each \ to-do on the list.
You can browse through a wealth of checklists that \ doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for \ your patient.

target.mrk: Las Listas de comprobación son medidas recomendadas que ayudan a que tu paciente logre \ una meta de salud o que se sienta mejor.
Los pacientes reciben recordatorios oportunos por cada \ quehacer en la lista.
Puedes navegar a través de una abundancia de listas de comprobación que \ los médicos en HealthTap han creado por tema y eligen el mejor para \ tu paciente.

trans-unit.resname: Try it out and then click continue.
trans-unit.source: Try it out and then click continue.

seg-source.mrk: Try it out and then click continue.

target.mrk: Inténtalo y luego haz clic en continuar.

trans-unit.resname: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only \ visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart \ Notes section.
trans-unit.source: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only \ visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart \ Notes section.

seg-source.mrk: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter.
If you wish to add notes only \ visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart \ Notes section.

target.mrk: Los pacientes ven las notas SOAP que ingresas.
Si sólo deseas agregar notas \ visibles a los médicos, por favor inclúyelas en la sección Notas Adicionales y Gráficos.
Haz clic en continuar cuando estés listo.

trans-unit.resname: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully \ or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. \ This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press \ the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.source: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully \ or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. \ This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press \ the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.

seg-source.mrk: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully \ or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult.
\ This notifies us and ends the consult.
Always inform your patient before you press \ the flag, as it will end the consult.

target.mrk: En el desafortunado caso que la consulta no pueda completarse exitosamente \ o que el paciente se comporte de forma inapropiada, por favor señalice la consulta.
\ Esto nos notifica y finaliza la consulta.
Siempre informa a tus pacientes antes que presiones \ la bandera, ya que eso terminará la consulta.

trans-unit.resname: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end \ and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their \ Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end \ so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click \ this button when you are done.
trans-unit.source: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end \ and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their \ Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end \ so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click \ this button when you are done.

seg-source.mrk: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end \ and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their \ Patient's Chart.
You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end \ so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note.
Then click \ this button when you are done.

target.mrk: Cuando haces clic en el botón 'Enviar y Finalizar Consulta', la consulta finalizará \ y tu Nota SOAP será enviada al paciente y se volverá una parte de su \ Gráfico de Pacientes.
Puedes preguntarle a tu paciente que finalice en su finalización \ para que así pueda tomar unos pocos minutos para terminar tu Nota SOAP.
Luego haga clic \ en este botón cuando estés listo.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a \ smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you \ care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a \ smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you \ care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.

seg-source.mrk: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a \ smile and warm greetings.
When ending a consult, show patients that you \ care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.

target.mrk: Por favor recuerde siempre comenzar y terminar cada consulta con una \ sonrisa y saludos cálidos.
Cuando finalice una consulta, muestra a los pacientes que tú \ los atiendes al preguntarles si hay algo más que puedas hacer para ayudarlos.

trans-unit.resname: Go ahead and click the button to end the consult and send your notes.
trans-unit.source: Go ahead and click the button to end the consult and send your notes.

seg-source.mrk: Go ahead and click the button to end the consult and send your notes.

target.mrk: Avanza y haz clic en el botón para finalizar la consulta y enviar tus notas.

trans-unit.resname: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your \ earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed \ monthly)

trans-unit.resname: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other \ on a 5-star scale. At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, \ and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to \ maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.
trans-unit.source: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other \ on a 5-star scale. At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, \ and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to \ maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.

seg-source.mrk: Once the consult has ended, you and the patient rate each other \ on a 5-star scale.
At HealthTap, we strive for the highest standards, \ and the highest levels of customer satisfaction, so it’s important to \ maintain a high star ratings to retain your HealthTap Concierge license.

target.mrk: Una vez que la consulta haya finalizado, tu y el paciente se califican el uno al otro \ en una escala de 5 estrellas.

En HealthTap, aspiramos a los estándares más altos, \ y los más altos niveles de satisfacción al cliente, para que sea importante para \ mantener unas calificaciones de altas estrellas para retener tu licencia HealthTap Concierge.

trans-unit.resname: Rate this consult and then you're a few steps away from completing the training!

trans-unit.resname: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important \ that you're online and available during your designated Virtual \ Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not \ have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on \ the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your \ patient calls.
trans-unit.source: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important \ that you're online and available during your designated Virtual \ Office Hours. seg-source.mrk: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important \ that you're online and available during your designated Virtual \ Office Hours.
Patients may be looking for you at these times.
You do not \ have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on \ the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app.
The app will ring when your \ patient calls.

target.mrk: Al igual que estás disponible cuando tu oficina {clinic_slash}real está abierta, es importante \ que estés en línea y disponible durante tus Horas de Oficina \ Virtual designadas.
Los pacientes pueden estar buscándote en estas horas.
No \ tienes que estar en tu escritorio, sencillamente regístrate y configúrate como "disponible" en \ la aplicación móvil HealthTap para Médicos.
La aplicación sonará cuando tu \ paciente llame.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download \ for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You \ can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can \ continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in \ homepage.

trans-unit.resname: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, \ and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office \ hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking \ "Practice Hours."

trans-unit.resname: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox \ Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that \ appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 \ hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit \ your SOAP Note.

These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that \ appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 \ hours.
You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit \ your SOAP Note.

target.mrk: Además, de consultas virtuales en vivo, también recibirás Consultas en \ la Bandeja de Entrada.
Estos son mensajes pagados y detallados de tus pacientes que \ aparecen en la parte superior de tu lista en la página de inicio y deben responderse dentro de 24 \ horas.
Ganarás $30 cuando completes consultas con los pacientes y envíes \ tu Nota SOAP.

trans-unit.resname: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that \ appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within \ 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation \ with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.
trans-unit.source: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that \ appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within \ 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation \ with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.

target.mrk: Las Consultas en la Bandeja de Entrada son preguntas detalladas de sus pacientes que \ aparecen en la parte superior de su lista de página de inicio y debe responderse dentro de \ 24 horas.
Puedes enviar preguntas de aclaratorias y tener una conversación \ con los pacientes.
Para finalizar la consulta, sencillamente envíe la nota SOAP.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please respond to any Inbox Consults within 24 hours. \ Submit your answer as a SOAP consult note, or ask your \ patient follow-up questions by entering your question and \ clicking the “Wait for response” button.
